wikipedia_page.main: Tom Hewitt  (26 April 1889 – 1980) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1911 and 1914, playing 8 matches. He played his first match on 28  January 1911 against Ireland and his last match on 16 March 1914 against England. At club level, he played for  Wrexham and Chelsea.
